title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 227 - STATIONARY COMBUSTION INSTALLATIONS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 227 - STATIONARY COMBUSTION INSTALLATIONS
State Regulations

Subpart 227-1 - Stationary Combustion Installations (§ 227-1.1 to 227-1.7)

Subpart 227-2 - Reasonably Available Control Technology (RACT) for Oxides of Nitrogen (NOx) (§ 227-2.1 to 227-2.7)

Subpart 227-3 - Ozone Season Oxides of Nitrogen (NOx) Emission Limits for Simple Cycle and Regenerative Combustion Turbines (§ 227-3.1 to 227-3.8)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 227

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 19-0311

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
